diy-product-fee-tips: If the price is unknown, please enter Â¥10 to place the order. Our agent will confirm the final price and notify you of any remaining balance.
diy-product-fee-transport-tips: Please enter the shipping cost from the seller to the Mulebuy warehouse.
diy-product-tips: On this page, you are submitting third-party products (such as Xianyu, Yupoo,etc.). Mulebuy can only help you find the linked sellers for product consultation, purchasing for you, and arranging third-party logistics delivery services. Mulebuy cannot distinguish the quality or authenticity of goods, please note this before purchasing.
diy-rules-link: The product link cannot be blank
rules-link-error: Please enter a valid product link

diy-rules-unit-unit-price: The unit price cannot be blank

diy-rules-shipping-min: Domestic shipping fee cannot be less than 1

diy-rules-unit-price-number: The unit price must be a number
